name: Dreamy Morning
description:
My Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcW4ietuI5tg0cKIb9EZiwA

Dreamy Morning is game made in 3 days.

Theme: Dreamy

Limitation: Every Playthrough is Unique

Controls:

Move - W A S D

Dreamy Morning is a game about a man who is too dreamy and overslept so did not realized time passed too fast. So he needs to be prepared and leave the home in 30 seconds.

Your goal is collect as much as props like some clothes, wallet, ID etc... and leave the home in time. (Door at left bottom of the home.)

Spawn locations of props are random so every playthrough is unique.
